name: MyFirstGame (OddmanGames)
description:
WASD - Move

LMB - Pick up object

For the My First Game Jam: Winter 2020 game jam

Your in your room, that has no windows for some reason, also with no door, just watching some Youtube and drinking some hot cocoa.

There's some plant you can grab, some books, Hell, Even the chair and table! But not the lamp.. you here me, not the lamp. Anyways, Have fun!
